skills.name: Wooden plank
skills.description: You took this wooden plank in order to attack the enemies, it is not the best attack but it is effective.

skills.name: The bible
skills.description: You are a religious man that always brings your bible in the bag, now you have to defend yourself in the name of God.

skills.name: Brew
skills.description: You saw this strange drink on a table and you thought that could be useful to recover yourself.

skills.name: injection
skills.description: You saw the doctor's suitcase and you decided to took some stuff. However you don't notice that it was a shot of adrenaline that will boost himself.

skills.name: Special soup
skills.description: When you arrivee to the kitchen you found a pot with a soup but whatyou didn't notice that you will have a boost of hp and def.

skills.name: Carrot's shurikens
skills.description: When you are in the kitchen you found 3 carrots and why don't use them to attack enemies.

skills.name: Haunted pen
skills.description: When you arrived to the hall you see a pen levitating and you decide to took it with you and not for write anything. The oen throws 2 burst of ink that  hurts and increases your hp

skills.name: Ceiling light jump
skills.description: He sees that if he arrives to the roof's light he can make an amazing jump that makes a lot of damage but he hurts himself.

skills.name: Whisperwind sweep
skills.description: It is an enchanted broom that transcends its mundane origins to become a formidable tool of combat

skills.name: Warming chandelier
skills.description: This object keeps you warm and gains hp and attack for 3 turns.

skills.name: Sclading sip
skills.description: Taking a little sip of this cup of tea makes to everyone a sensation of being stronger and increases de defense but as it is too hot it decreases some hp.

skills.name: Umbrella's fury
skills.description: An umbrella found in a little space that makes two incredible hits to the enemies one when it is closed and another when it is opened.

skills.name: Rudder's spin
skills.description: With the direction wheel you can use it as a boomerang in order to hit twice, it reduces your defense because you have to be very careful to pick it back

skills.name: Telescope vision
skills.description: With the captain's telescope you can see your enemies from everywhere and this can be helpful to recover some life and prepare your next attack

skills.name: Fit of rage
skills.description: You enter in a critical situation where you try to do a lot of damage but it reduces a lot the hp and the defense.
